features: 32-ounce insulated stainless-steel water bottle with a FreeSip spout and push-button lid with lock
Patented FreeSip spout designed for either sipping upright through the built-in straw or tilting back to swig from the spout opening
Protective push-to-open lid keeps spout clean; convenient carry loop doubles as a lock
Double-wall insulation keeps drinks cold for up to 24 hours; wide opening for cleaning and adding ice; cup holder-friendly base
BPA, lead, and phthalate-free; hand wash cup, dishwasher-safe lid; not for use with hot liquids
body.description: The Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless-Steel Water Bottle with Locking Push-Button Lid easily tackles every thirst. With a built-in, easy-clean straw and a wide-mouth opening, the FreeSip reusable bottle is designed for drinking two different ways: sipping upright through the straw or tilting back to swig from the wide-mouth spout opening. Add in a push-to-open lid and playful colors, and staying hydrated has never been simpler—or more fun. Additional features include double-wall insulated stainless steel that keeps drinks cold up to 24 hours, a carry loop that doubles as a lock, and a wide opening for easy cleaning and adding ice. The Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless-Steel Water Bottle with Locking Push-Button Lid is available in three sizes: 24-Ounce, 32-Ounce, and 40-Ounce. Lid is dishwasher safe; hand wash cup. Not for use with hot liquids. Manufacturer’s limited lifetime warranty.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hi. We make water bottles. Why? Well, we’re a motley crew of dreamers and designers who live by a simple creed: “Do more of what you love.”​ And we love designing things that make life a little bit easier and a heckuva a lot more enjoyable. We asked ourselves, with so many different kinds of water bottles out there, why do 3 out of 4 people still suffer from chronic dehydration? So we rolled up our sleeves and got to work. We created what we believe to be the finest water bottles in all the land. Water bottles designed to help you do more of what you love. So, what are you waiting for? Go forth and carpe the diem—hydrated like a boss.

FreeSip Spout What makes the Owala FreeSip so different than other bottles? The FreeSip has a patented 2-in-1 spout that rocks BOTH a built-in straw for sipping AND a wide-mouth opening for chugging. That’s right—two different ways to drink. Easy to Clean Designed to be quick and easy to disassemble, with minimal hard-to-reach surfaces. Lid and straw are dishwasher safe. Hand wash cup with Owala 2-in-1 Water Bottle Brush (sold separately). Cup Holder Friendly Base Because you'll want to take this bottle everywhere, the 24-Ounce bottles are cup-holder friendly. Now you can stay hydrated on-the-go. Keeps Drinks Cold Triple-layered, vacuum-insulated stainless steel keeps drinks cold for up to 24-hours. Plus, this bottle is made from BPA- and phthalate-free materials.

Owala FreeSip Insulated Water Bottle Owala Smoothsip Owala Kids Flip Owala Kids Tumblr Owala Pet Bowl Owala Bottle Boot Durable Stainless Steel ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Lid Type Push-button FreeSip spout Splash-Resistant Flip-Top Sip or Swig The choice is all yours Sip Sip Leak Proof ✓ ✓ ✓ Carry Loop ✓ ✓ Keeps Drinks Cold for 24-Hours ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Anti-Slip ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Hydration Companion: Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle Review
reviews.reviewText: I am absolutely thrilled with the Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle. This 32 oz bottle has become my go-to hydration companion, offering convenience, durability, and style all in one package.First and foremost, the quality of this water bottle is outstanding. The stainless steel construction ensures durability and longevity, while the double-wall insulation keeps my drinks cold for hours on end. Whether I'm at the gym, on a hike, or running errands, I can always count on this bottle to keep my water refreshingly chilled.The FreeSip straw design is a game-changer, allowing for easy, one-handed drinking without the need to tilt the bottle. The straw is BPA-free and provides a comfortable drinking experience, making it perfect for staying hydrated on the go.I also appreciate the thoughtful design features of this bottle, such as the leak-proof lid and convenient carry handle. The camo cool design adds a touch of personality to my hydration routine, standing out from the crowd in style.Since switching to the Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle, I've noticed a significant improvement in my hydration habits. The generous 32 oz capacity ensures I always have plenty of water on hand, encouraging me to stay hydrated throughout the day.Overall, I couldn't be happier with this water bottle. If you're in search of a high-quality, stylish, and functional hydration solution, look no further. The Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle has earned its place as my hydration companion, and I give it a well-deserved five-star rating!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect water bottle
reviews.reviewText: Yes, this bottle prevents leaks and spills. Yes, this bottle keeps beverages cold. Yes, it has a great carrying handle and complimentary colors. But what really stands out about this one is how great it is to drink from. When I was a teacher, I had students who called their water bottle their comfort blanket. Never understood it until now. I don't like drinking out of a straw, but the opening for the straw is so perfect and convenient, I use it over the large opening. I'm drinking 3 bottles (32 oz bottle) a day now, way more than I ever have before. The water somehow tastes better (maybe how cold it is?) too making me more likely to drink. I've had other water bottles. Hated them all. But I LOVE this one and bring it everywhere

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Owala is the best water bottle I’ve ever used. It keeps liquids cold all day, has a great flip top opening, a handle to carry it, and best of all, its straw sippy mechanism works like a charm. No having to tip it upside down. It’s also easy to clean and comes in great colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Owala 32 oz Water Bottle
reviews.reviewText: This water bottle is so unique like no other. Aside from keeping my drink cold for a long time, aside from the very colorful top that attracted me foremost ever since the first time I laid my eyes on it, I love so much the sip and swig features - big spout opening and the unique sip hole that looks like a contour of a pursed lip. The big straw inside that is connected to it gives me the right size amount of drink, water in this case, when I have to take in a sip to drink some medication. Proven for its quality, last night, I placed a couple of lemon slices to my water inside and let it seep through overnight. This morning, when I took a sip, some of the lemon parts got stuck at the bottom end of the straw, preventing me to drink a good amount of my usual sip. It was no problem at all. That’s where the swig features comes in handy. I tilted my head and got a good gulp amount of water. Boy I just love this Owala. I love parading it at work, swinging and swaying it around with the easy lift and secure handle. No spill at all. 32 oz is the most perfect size for me. (Oh my, first time a wrote a long review. Sorry, can’t control myself, I just love this Owala)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Repeated customer - this has got to be the best water bottle out there!
reviews.reviewText: This is my third Owala bottle: My car has a smaller sidekick, and my husband "permanently adopted" my previous 40-ounce giant (can't blame him!), so I needed a trusty replacement.Owala's straw design is pure genius. I usually sip mindlessly while working or driving, and not having to crane my neck for every gulp is a game-changer. But when it's time to guzzle after a Beat Saber sweat-fest, the wide mouth delivers like a champ.This bottle also takes "hydration hero" seriously. My water stays refreshingly chilly for hours, even on scorching days. No more lukewarm disappointments – just consistent, cool sips of satisfaction. I haven't scientifically measured its chill power, but trust me, you'll never utter the dreaded "Huh, lukewarm?" again.Owala's color game is on point. I love the unique and vibrant combinations, and these bottles are conversation starters for sure. I get constant compliments and "where'd you get that?" questions.Two thumbs up (and maybe two sips for good measure).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I really love this water bottle!
reviews.reviewText: Seriously, I love everything about this! The colors are great, I love colorful. I love the straw part for sipping and then there is the swig which is so great when I am really thirsty! Perfect concept. And it's leak proof, I can toss it into my purse or my tote and not have a second thought about it making a mess in said purse or tote. The way it locks to make it leak proof is great! and the push botton! Seriously this is great! I bought the 24 ounce bottle, but I see a 32 ounce in my future!Yes, this does keep the liquids cold, very cold!!The only thing I wish it could do is to hold hot beverages too! But I have others that will do that, so I'm covered. :) Love this thing, buy it, you'll love it too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars lead free drinking experience!
reviews.reviewText: this is the best water bottle i have ever used. it is extremely easy to carry around, easy to clean, and easy to drink from. it is also very durable as I've dropped it many times with no cosmetic damage. the colors are also cute! way better than stanley! 10/10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: In the photo you see dawn, just a size comparison! But all that aside I love LOVE this water bottle it is great! The color is iced breeze it is just gorgeous. It is 40oz I wanted to get 25oz but 50$ for 25oz is crazy! 40 oz was cheaper weirdly enough.. it came super fast I ordered it Tuesday it is now Thursday and I got free shipping so I didn’t pay for fast! The water bottle does not leak at all and it keeps my water so cold! Great job owala love this❤️
Entregue antes do prazo e com qualidade

The media could not be loaded. A garrafa é muito boa e conserva muito bem a água gelada. Achei bem fácil de limpar, todas as partes são removíveis. Por ser de 946mL, é uma garrafa bem grande e talvez não seja tão facil de levar por aí.No geral, tem um preço salgado, mas cumpre o que promete: mantem a água gelada, fácil de limpar, aparenta ser resistente, não vaza mesmo chacoalhando, muito confortável de beber no canudo ou gargalo. A entrega chegou um pouco antes do previsto.Nota 9/10, pelo preço que poderia ser mais acessível.

I came across an article called "Stanley's are overrated. Get this water bottle instead". That link brought me to the Owala water bottle. I love how there is a chug spout plus an internal straw. There's no grabbing at a mouth piece with your hands. The internal straw is my favourite thing about this water bottle. The shape of the bottle is also comfortable to hold in your hand, even for people with petite hands. What I really appreciated about this water bottle was that there were little stickers (easy to remove and didn't leave sticky residue) on the parts of the lid to guide you how the cap works! I thought the stickers were cute and totally genius! Bottle and lid are easy to clean. I did order their specific cleaning brush but it hasn't arrived yet. My kids even are intrigued by this water bottle after purchasing their own Stanley's ("it's trending right now" was the answer to why they wanted Stanley's haha). Extremely happy with this Owala purchase. It's helped me drink more water throughout the day as it keeps it nice and cold. It's also an adequate size. Not too big or small. Because it's leak proof when closed, you can throw it in your purse or bag without worrying about it spilling - can't do that with a Stanley! If you're looking for a reasonably priced water bottle with great function, absolutely get this one. Everyone in the family will be getting these as gifts this year!

The media could not be loaded. Es lo más ingenioso el diseño, al dejar tomar ya sea con popote sin inclinar la botella o de trago inclinándola. También está muy bien pensado el bloqueo para que no se abra la tapa ni salga agua cuando traes la botella guardada. La tapa además trae un resorte para que si inclinas la botella para tomar no se te venga encima la tapa (ver video incluido). Es fácil de limpiar, mantiene el agua a buena temperatura, y aunque aguanta mucha agua la botella está de muy buen tamaño para no sentir que traes algo enorme como las de plástico que parecen mancuerna de gimnasio. Muy recomendada
Tiene buen tamaño y es a prueba de fugas, es cómodo y fácil de llevar a todos lados.
